slide1.title: Welcome to CAMPUS
slide1.text: The new app to use during your coffee break to get updates on the campus life!

slide2.title: Stay up to date
slide2.text: CAMPUS allows you to be aware of any event occurring on the campus, from pancake sales to Enfoiros concerts!

slide3.title: Never forget your laundry
slide3.text: CAMPUS will inform you on the availability of washing machines and will remind you just before yours finishes!

slide4.title: Proximo
slide4.text: Are you short on pasta? Or maybe you feel a little peckish, then look up your INSA shop's stock in real time

slide6.title: RU Menu
slide6.text: For the hungry, check this week's menu!

slide7.title: More to come...
slide7.text: New features are coming soon, do not hesitate to give us feedback to improve the app

updateSlide.title: New in this update!
updateSlide.text: The app got a new UI ! Faster, prettier and more modern, we hope you'll love it!

aprilFoolsSlide.title: New in this update!
aprilFoolsSlide.text:
We heard you, you don't like the new design and colors, so we changed them!
Love.

settingsScreen.startScreenSub: Select which screen to start the app on

dashboard.menuSubtitle: Click here to see the menu

planningScreen.wipSubtitle: Soon, every event at the INSA Toulouse in one place !

aboutScreen.bugsDescription: Reporting bugs helps us make the app better. Please be as precise as possible when describing your problem!
aboutScreen.author: Author

proximoScreen.description: The Proximo is your small grocery store maintained by students directly on the campus. Open every day from 18h30 to 19h30, we welcome you when you are short on pastas or sodas ! Different products for different problems, everything at cost price. You can pay by Lydia or cash.

proxiwashScreen.error: Could not update machines state. Pull down to retry.
proxiwashScreen.description: This is the washing service operated by Promologis for INSA's residences (We don't mind if you do not live on the campus and you do your laundry here). The room is right next to the R2, with 3 dryers and 9 washers, is open 7d/7 24h/24 ! Here you can check their availability ! You can bring your own detergent, use the one given on site or buy it at the Proximo (cheaper than the one given by the machines ). You can pay by credit card or cash.
proxiwashScreen.paymentMethodsDescription:
Cash up until 10€.
Credit Card also accepted.
proxiwashScreen.washerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.

When the program is finished, the screen indicates 'Programme terminé', press the yellow button to open the lid and retrieve your laundry.
proxiwashScreen.washerTips:
Program 'blanc/couleur': 6kg of dry laundry (cotton linen, linen, underwear, sheets, jeans, towels).

Program 'non repassable': 3,5 kg of dry laundry (synthetic fibre linen, cotton and polyester mixed).

Program 'fin 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (delicate linen in synthetic fibres).

Program 'laine 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (wool textiles).
proxiwashScreen.dryerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.
proxiwashScreen.dryerTips: The advised dryer length is 35 minutes for 14 kg of laundry. You can choose a shorter length if the dryer is not fully charged.
proxiwashScreen.enableNotificationsTip: Click on a running machine to enable notifications

modal.finished: This machine is finished. If you started it, you can get back your laundry.
modal.ready: This machine is empty and ready to use.
modal.running:
This machine has been started at %{start} and will end at %{end}.
Remaining time: %{remaining} min
modal.broken: This machine is broken and cannot be used. Thank you for your comprehension.
modal.error: There has been an error and we are unable to get information from this machine. Sorry for the inconvenience.
modal.notificationErrorDescription: Impossible to create notifications. Please make sure you enabled notifications then restart the app.

notifications.machineFinishedBody: The machine n°{{number}} is finished and your laundry is ready to pickup
notifications.machineRunningBody: The machine n°{{number}} is still running

planexScreen.enableStartScreen: Come here often? Set it as default screen!

profileScreen.clubsSubtitle: Click on a club to show its information
profileScreen.membershipSubtitle: Allows you to take part in various activities

scannerScreen.errorPermission:
Scanotron 3000 needs access to the camera in order to scan QR codes.
The camera will never be used for any other purpose.
scannerScreen.errorMessage: The QR code scanned could not be recognised, please make sure it is valid.
scannerScreen.helpMessage: Find Campus QR codes posted by clubs and events, scan them and get instant access to detailed information!

loginScreen.title: Amicale account
loginScreen.subtitle: Please enter your credentials
loginScreen.whyAccountSub: What can you do wth an account
loginScreen.whyAccountParagraph: An Amicale account allows you to take part in several activities around campus. You can join a club, or even create your own!
loginScreen.whyAccountParagraph2: Logging into your Amicale account on the app will allow you to see all available clubs on the campus, vote for the upcoming elections, and more to come!
loginScreen.noAccount: No Account? Go to the Amicale's building during open hours to create one.

errors.title: Error!
errors.badToken: You are not logged in. Please login and try again.
errors.noConsent: You did not give your consent for data processing to the Amicale.
errors.forbidden: You do not have access to this data.
errors.connectionError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

clubs.managersSubtitle: These people make the club live
clubs.categoriesFilterMessage: Click on a category to filter the list
